_instructions: Add rules you learn from Riley Coleman's course here. The system reads this file and uses the rules to filter and score every trade. No programming needed — just edit the values.

trade_only_hours._note: Avoid the last 30 minutes before close. Adjust if Riley recommends different hours.

session_rules._note: Skip the first 15 minutes of market open (high volatility, false signals).

signal_filters._note: Only take signals with this confidence score or higher (0.0–1.0).
Minimum risk-reward ratio. Riley may recommend 2:1 or higher.
Set to true to skip trading a stock in the week of its earnings report.
Leave empty to trade all symbols, or list Riley's favourite setups e.g. ['AAPL','NVDA'].
Symbols to never trade (e.g. ones Riley says to avoid).

trade_management._note: Move stop to entry price once the trade reaches 1:1 R:R. Reduces risk on winning trades.
Set partial_exit_at_rr to e.g. 1.0 and partial_exit_pct to 0.5 to take off half the position at 1:1.

market_conditions._note: Set true to only take LONG trades in an uptrending market (SPY above 20 EMA) and SHORT in downtrend.
If the Average Daily Range is below 0.5% the market is too choppy. Skip trading.

notes_from_course: Add notes here as you go through the 90-day course.
Example: Riley says to only trade the first 2 hours of the session.
Example: Riley says R:R must be at least 2:1 minimum.
Example: Riley says avoid Mondays — institutional orders not settled.
